# Instructions for Large Language Models (LLMs)

project: UI Component Library & Documentation
framework: Next.js (React)
language: JavaScript / TypeScript
styling: Tailwind CSS

# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Authoritative documentation sources
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
docs:
  - /README.md
  - /docs
  - /components/ui

# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Code that LLMs are allowed to learn from and reference
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
allow:
  - /components
  - /components/ui
  - /components/layout
  - /hooks
  - /lib
  - /app
  - /pages

# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Code and files that should NOT be learned from
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
disallow:
  - /node_modules
  - /dist
  - /build
  - /.next
  - /public/assets
  - /scripts
  - /internal
  - /tests
  - *.config.js
  - *.lock

# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Usage & style guidelines for AI
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
notes:
  - Use functional React components only
  - Prefer client components only when necessary ("use client")
  - Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
  - Avoid inline styles unless explicitly required
  - Components are reusable and composable
  - Prefer clarity over abstraction
  - Follow modern React & Next.js best practices
